title: Molly.
content: I heard something about in K6 where you can get something to open the end doors without you. like she walks to you. how is this? it was posted on one of these forums, but I cant find it.

title: Re: Molly.
content:
I read this on an archived site, i don't know how, though.
I'm guessing that in keen 6, molly jumps around. Too bad i don't have the game... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]


w00t post 1000!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Molly.
content:
I read that it's a bug in a version of Keen 6 (can't remember which... possibly 1.0...)

I've got that version on my Keen-O-Matic... I must check the version number.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: well
content:
My version's 1.4, and she just hops right through the doors as if they didn't exist. Check the [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k6-lvl15.html]level map from CC314[/url]... see at the lower left, how Molly is positioned behind those 4 doors? In my version, she'll hop to the right, going right through all those doors, and wind up balanced on the corner right next to the door with the "NO" sign near it. :-) Strange.

Edit: I think those maps use "Normal" difficulty... I swear I remember there being 2 Orbatrixes in that last room.

title: Re: well
content: Yeah, in version 1.4 Molly slides through the doors. If I remember correct she's placed one tile too low and that causes it.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: well
content: huh, ill have to see something. I dont know what version I have, and I THINK i updated it with some patches. but yeah, thanks. i was wondering what was up with that [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shockshund.gif[/img]

title: Re: well
content:
1.4 - I will have to get the patch for that. I could have sworn I had 1.4...

I worded what I said wrongly in my last post. I've got version 1.0 - not the version with the impatient Molly. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] --------------

title: Re: well
content:
why are you guys so lucky?? I want keen 6!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Thats like the only bad bug in the series besides the one where berkaloids can shoot through floors.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: well
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Thats like the only bad bug in the series besides the one where berkaloids can shoot through floors.[hr][/quote] I've never seen an berkaloid shooting through a floor. Where does it happen?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] What version of Keen 4??[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I must see that bug!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] -------------------

title: Re: well
content: IIRC it's in every version of Keen 4. And it doesn't happen often. Keep looking on berkeloids for a while and it may be that the bug appears.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: well
content:
Go underground right below where the berkaloid on easy is.
Eventually a flame will go right through!![img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: well
content:
Heh, I always thought that was intentional! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] --------------

title: Re: well
content: So did I - the bit where I've seen it happen is when the Berkeloid appears to throw the flame through a thin wall and it falls down once it's been 'pushed' through the wall.  It added a certain element of surprise to the level...
